name: assert
description: The assert module from Node.js, for the browser.

scripts.build: babel assert.js test.js --out-dir build && babel internal --out-dir build/internal && babel test --out-dir build/test
scripts.dev: babel assert.js test.js --watch --out-dir build & babel internal --watch --out-dir build/internal & babel test --watch --out-dir build/test
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:nobuild
